issue.title: Problems stopping all processes associated with ignition

content.raw:
At least one deadlock issue was introduced at shutdown via [#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184) and was resolved via [#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/194/fixing-a-deadlock-i-introduced-in-the-base/diff](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/194/fixing-a-deadlock-i-introduced-in-the-base/diff)

At this point, I can’t seem to reproduce this behavior locally, but since the issue was opened before #184 was merged, I can’t be confident that #184 was the only factor.  If you continue to see issues after #194, please let me know, so that I can work on constructing a case that consistently reproduces the bug.

At least one deadlock issue was introduced at shutdown via #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184 and was resolved via #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/194/fixing-a-deadlock-i-introduced-in-the-base/diff

At this point, I can’t seem to reproduce this behavior locally, but since the issue was opened before #184 was merged, I can’t be confident that #184 was the only factor. If you continue to see issues after #194, please let me know, so that I can work on constructing a case that consistently reproduces the bug.
